p: However, a magnification of pristine and the material containing Zn(II) and 3-CPACl diffraction patterns ( Figure 5 a) show a shift toward higher 2θ values (14.04°), indicating a contraction of the primitive cell to 6.3027 Å which can be related to the incorporation of chloride in I – sites.
